alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:58PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of Weber...southern Cache...east central Box Elder...northeastern Davis and west central Morgan Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 456 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a line extending from near Wellsville to near Marriott-Slaterville to 9 miles southwest of Hooper. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Logan, Farmington, Brigham City, Tremonton, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hyrum, Hooper, South Weber and Perry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 328 and 376. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 102. US Route 89 between mile markers 459 and 469. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
